SmartSit - A smart chair with built-in sensors and AI technology that can detect and adjust its position to optimize comfort and productivity based on the user's posture and activities. Confidence score: 0.8

AirChair - A chair that incorporates air-filled cells for ergonomic support and adjustable air pressure for customizable comfort. The cells can also be inflated or deflated remotely using a smartphone app, allowing users to make adjustments on-the-go. Confidence score: 0.9

VibraChair - A chair that uses vibration technology to stimulate blood flow and reduce muscle fatigue. The vibrations can be adjusted to different intensities and patterns to suit individual preferences and needs. Confidence score: 0.8

MoodChair - A chair that uses color-changing fabric and mood-sensing technology to create a personalized and adaptive seating experience. The chair can adjust its color and lighting to match the user's mood and emotions, promoting a more comfortable and relaxing atmosphere. Confidence score: 0.9

PlayChair - A chair that incorporates interactive gaming elements, such as buttons, joysticks, and sensors, to create a fun and engaging seating experience. Users can play games, compete with friends, and even earn rewards and achievements while sitting in the chair. Confidence score: 0.9
